hackathon-description-text: Brooklyn Tech Triangle and TENDIGI are teaming up with Brooklyn-based programmers to present the Tech Triangle's first ever Mentorship Hackathon. Experienced developers, programmers, and designers will coach teams of college and professional students to build a function app in just one weekend.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Month-long extended trial for General Assembly's Front Row access; Technical books from informIT; delivery.com certificate; all meals, all weekend long
Month-long extended trial for General Assembly's Front Row access; Technical books from informIT; delivery.com certificate; all meals, all weekend long

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2 Metrotech Center, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Creativity and originality of the idea
Execution of idea into a functioning app
Identification of clear market, potential impact, and strategies for revenue models and overcoming challenges

hackathon-description-header: Connecting students with professionals in the Brooklyn Tech Triangle to create mobile and web apps.
